Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD reasonably concluded that the applicants failed to meet admission conditions and lacked sufficient humanitarian grounds to remain in Canada
Legal_Provision: Subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Basis_of_Claim: Failure to meet immigration conditions as entrepreneur immigrants
Key_Factor_in_Determination: No undue hardship upon return to Lebanon
Proceeding_Type: Administrative appeal followed by judicial review
Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of IAD's conclusion on admission conditions and humanitarian grounds
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Subsection 72(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to meet entrepreneurial immigration conditions
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of insufficient consideration of evidence by IAD
Omission_Type: Failure to meet investment and compliance requirements
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Failure to meet admission conditions as entrepreneur immigrants
